name: Flying Snake
movement: 30 ft. walking, 60 ft. flying, 30 ft. swimming
description: The Flying Snake is a tiny, agile creature that can navigate both aerial and aquatic environments with ease. It features a slender body and possesses a notable ability to fly.
memorable: Its Flyby ability allows it to escape attacks while striking, making it a slippery foe in combat.
goals: To strike quickly and evade danger, relying on speed rather than brute strength.
relations: Commonly found in environments where small, agile creatures thrive.
environment: Aerial and aquatic environments such as jungles and swamps.
strengths: Exceptional agility allows it to avoid attacks and reposition during combat.
weaknesses: Low Strength and Constitution make it physically weak and fragile.
attacks: Bite attack that deals piercing damage and potential poison damage.
most_powerful_ability: Flyby ability enables it to move without provoking opportunity attacks.
senses: Has keen senses with a perception score of 11, allowing it to detect threats effectively.
skills: Proficient in Stealth, with a notable score of 13.
additional_information: Low Challenge Rating of CR 1/8 indicating minimal threat level.
Utilizes Reflexive Escape to avoid damage from ranged attacks.
Has a very low Intelligence score indicating limited reasoning capabilities.
test_queries: snake that can fly and evade attacks
small snake using agility to survive
